news.title: Sanlayan raises $21.7M crore from investors including Ashish Kacholia, Jungle Ventures and Shastra VC
news.excerpt: Sanlayan, a startup focused on sustainable agriculture, has raised Rs186 crore in a funding round led by prominent investors including Ashish Kacholia and Lashit Sanghvi.

news.title: Deeptech startup ALT CARBON raises $12 Mn in seed round
news.excerpt: DeepTech startup ALT CARBON raises $12 Mn in seed round from leading investors to scale their carbon capture technology solutions.

news.title: AvammuneTherapeutics, Posha, Inspecity others secure funding
news.excerpt: Multiple startups across healthcare, food tech, and inspection technology secure early-stage funding rounds.

news.title: SaaS startup Simplismart raises $7 Mn in Series A funding
news.excerpt: Bengaluru-based SaaS startup Simplismart has secured $7 million in a Series A funding round led by Accel, with participation from Shastra VC, Titan Capital, and others

news.title: Spacetech Startup Sisir Radar Bags Funding To Offer Imaging Solutions
news.excerpt: Spacetech startup Sisir Radar has raised $1.5 Mn (INR 12.45 Cr) in its seed funding round led by Shastra VC. The round also saw participation from Riverwalk Holdings and INVSTT.The Kolkata-based startup, which claims to have built India’s first drone-borne synthetic aperture radar (SAR) system, will utilise the fresh funds to strengthen its research and development (R&D) and manufacturing capabilities. It aims to launch the world’s highest resolution L-band SAR satellite by the end of 2026.
